LanguageData.GR_AlphaBear.label: paragon bear
LanguageData.GR_AlphaBear.description: This massive bear can grow to sizes dwarfing regular grizzly bears, reaching up to a metrical ton in weight. Their thick pelt is an almost perfect adaptation to cold climates, allowing them to survive for months in hibernation if necessary. While still omnivorous, their teeth are better suited to a higher degree of herbivory than grizzly bears.\n\nUseful abilities: Paragon bear pelts can be sold for profit, or converted into decorational rugs.
LanguageData.GR_AlphaBear.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.GR_AlphaBear.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.GR_AlphaBear.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.GR_AlphaBear_Corpse.label: paragon bear corpse
LanguageData.GR_AlphaWildBoar.label: paragon wild boar
LanguageData.GR_AlphaWildBoar.description: This strong, muscular creature is fiercely territorial, and its powerful curved tusks can be extremely dangerous for the unwary hunter.\n\nUseful abilities: Paragon wild boar tusks are prized for their ivory, and can be carved into statuettes.
LanguageData.GR_AlphaWildBoar.tools.0.label: tusk
LanguageData.GR_AlphaWildBoar.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.GR_AlphaWildBoar_Corpse.label: paragon wild boar corpse
LanguageData.GR_AlphaBoomalope.label: paragon boomalope
LanguageData.GR_AlphaBoomalope.description: This tall, lean ungulate usually acts as the dominant individual on a herd of boomalopes. More resistant and stronger than regular boomalopes, the paragon boomalopes also carry greater quantities of unstable chemical filled sacs, so no predator wants to even get close to them.\n\nUseful abilities: Paragon boomalopes explode when killed, with greater force than regular boomalopes. They also produce large amounts of chemfuel.
LanguageData.GR_AlphaBoomalope.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.GR_AlphaBoomalope_Corpse.label: paragon boomalope corpse
LanguageData.GR_AlphaChicken.label: paragon chicken
LanguageData.GR_AlphaChicken.description: This huge chicken towers above its regular brethren. Eggs laid by this species are the stuff of legends.\n\nUseful abilities: Fast breeding, more meat than regular chickens, and delicious eggs. A nice farm animal!
LanguageData.GR_AlphaChicken.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.GR_AlphaChicken.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.GR_AlphaChicken_Meat.label: paragon chicken meat
LanguageData.GR_AlphaChicken_Corpse.label: paragon chicken corpse
LanguageData.GR_AlphaEmu.label: paragon emu
LanguageData.GR_AlphaEmu.description: This huge flightless bird is incredibly bad tempered and ugly as sin. However, it produces some enormous eggs, and its fat can be rubbed on skin and used as a primitive bush medicine.\n\nUseful abilities: Very nutritive eggs. Once slaughtered, its fat can be used as a basic medicine.
LanguageData.GR_AlphaEmu.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.GR_AlphaEmu.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.GR_AlphaEmu_Corpse.label: paragon emu corpse
LanguageData.GR_AlphaMuffalo.label: paragon muffalo
LanguageData.GR_AlphaMuffalo.description: A huge, hairy quadruped perfectly adapted to extreme cold climates. Peaceful unless disturbed.\n\nUseful abilities: Pack animal. Produces milk and wool in slightly greater quantities than a regular muffalo. It's pelt is valuable, and can be used as a decorative rug.
LanguageData.GR_AlphaMuffalo.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.GR_AlphaMuffalo_Corpse.label: paragon muffalo corpse
LanguageData.GR_AlphaOstrich.label: paragon ostrich
LanguageData.GR_AlphaOstrich.description: A truly enormous ostrich. This flightless bird lays huge eggs, very nutritive.\n\nUseful abilities: Lays the biggest eggs of any non-hybrid creature.
LanguageData.GR_AlphaOstrich.tools.0.label: claws
LanguageData.GR_AlphaOstrich.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.GR_AlphaOstrich_Corpse.label: paragon ostrich corpse
LanguageData.GR_AlphaRhinoceros.label: paragon rhinoceros
LanguageData.GR_AlphaRhinoceros.description: The very ground trembles when this massive herbivore moves. Although usually quite peaceful, it can be very aggressive when provoked. Its horn is considered to be very valuable, despite lack of scientific evidence of it being useful at all in fields like medicine.\n\nUseful abilities: It's horn is valuable, and... you don't want to be in the path of a charging paragon rhinoceros.
LanguageData.GR_AlphaRhinoceros.tools.0.label: horn
LanguageData.GR_AlphaRhinoceros.tools.1.label: horn
LanguageData.GR_AlphaRhinoceros.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.GR_AlphaRhinoceros_Corpse.label: paragon rhinoceros corpse
LanguageData.GR_AlphaWolfTimber.label: paragon timber wolf
LanguageData.GR_AlphaWolfTimber.description: This huge wolf can be turned into a fierce, loyal companion if properly trained. Wolf pelts have long been used as trade goods.\n\nUseful abilities: The paragon wolf's pelt can be traded for a profit, or used to craft a wolf pelt rug, which isn't tacky at all. Nope.
LanguageData.GR_AlphaWolfTimber.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.GR_AlphaWolfTimber.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.GR_AlphaWolfTimber.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.GR_AlphaWolfTimber_Corpse.label: paragon timber wolf corpse
LanguageData.GR_AlphaHare.label: paragon hare
LanguageData.GR_AlphaHare.description: This small creature has a fierce gaze and quite a poor disposition. Be careful with these critters, since they breed like... well... rabbits.\n\nUseful abilities: Due to a terrible sense of humour in your scientists, this creatures lays edible chocolate eggs...
LanguageData.GR_AlphaHare.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.GR_AlphaHare_Corpse.label: paragon hare corpse
LanguageData.GR_AlphaIguana.label: paragon iguana
LanguageData.GR_AlphaIguana.description: This large lizard has a beautiful iridiscent sheen on its scales. Contrary to the regular iguanas, this paragon specimen has a nasty venomous bite.\n\nUseful abilities: Lays eggs and has a venomous bite.
LanguageData.GR_AlphaIguana.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.GR_AlphaIguana.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.GR_AlphaIguana.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.GR_AlphaIguana_Corpse.label: paragon iguana corpse
LanguageData.GR_AlphaPig.label: paragon pig
LanguageData.GR_AlphaPig.description: This huge pig has a voracious appetite, but the quality of its meat is legendary.\n\nUseful abilities: The butchering process will produce bacon jerky and jamón serrano, two delicacies that can be stored for months without refrigeration.
LanguageData.GR_AlphaPig.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.GR_AlphaPig_Corpse.label: paragon pig corpse
LanguageData.GR_AlphaRat.label: paragon rat
LanguageData.GR_AlphaRat.description: This rat is obviously disease ridden.\n\nUseful abilities: Paragon rats spread the bubonic plague when they bite. Careful!
LanguageData.GR_AlphaRat.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.GR_AlphaRat.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.GR_AlphaRat.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.GR_AlphaRat_Corpse.label: paragon rat corpse
LanguageData.GR_AlphaTortoise.label: paragon tortoise
LanguageData.GR_AlphaTortoise.description: This heavily armored land-dwelling reptile is known for its slow moving speed and surprisingly vicious bite.\n\nUseful abilities: Paragon tortoises can be butchered to obtain their shells, and with a big enough tortoise farm it could probably be used as a building material.
LanguageData.GR_AlphaTortoise.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.GR_AlphaTortoise_Corpse.label: paragon tortoise corpse
